about_the_game:
Supporter Pack - Monster Girl

Enjoying "Endgame of Devil"? Elevate your experience with our exclusive supporter pack! Your purchase fuels our development and helps us bring more exciting content. Thank you for your incredible support!

This Supporter Pack Includes:

45 Monster Girl Skins for Minions

Barbatos:

Fire Imp, Poison Imp, Blue Devil, Candle Demon, Darksaber, Blood Servant, Slime, Ghost Captain, Blood Mage, Fire Dragon, Thunder Dragon, Shoggoth, Lich, Chaos Lord, Shub-Niggurath.

Frankenstein:

Old Mummy, Student, Supervisory Unit, Thief, Burnt Corpse, Star Demon, Gnome, Dwarf Guard, Dwarf Miner, Tide Lord, Zombie Bear, Griffin, Angler, Laplace's Demon, Phoenix.

Xiwangmu:

Giant Clam, Boxer, Ghost Blade, Swordsmith, Jade Sculptor, Stone Tablet, Cursed Statue, Wraith, Red-Haired Yaksha, Tomb Spirit, Jade Golem, Jade Loong, White Elephant, Qing Lion, Jing Wei

You can enable or disable these skins in the settings menu.

Unique Treasure: Monkey Hair

Allows a powerful one-time copy during the battle, but be cautious—it also attracts powerful adventurers!

You can activate and carry it in the bottom left of the game selection screen.

package_groups.title: Buy Endgame of Devil-Supporter Pack: Monster Girl

short_description: By purchasing this DLC, you'll receive: 45 Monster Girl skins and 1 unique treasure. Thank you for supporting the developers!

Simplified Chinese*, English, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
